summary: A family of beekeepers living in the Tuscan countryside finds their household disrupted by the simultaneous arrival of a silently troubled teenage boy and a reality TV show intent on showcasing the family.
cast: Maria Alexandra Lungu|Sam Louwyck|Alba Rohrwacher|Sabine Timoteo|Agnese Graziani|Luis Huilca|Eva Lea Pace Morrow|Maris Stella Morrow|Monica Bellucci|Carlo Tarmati|Margarete Tiesel|André Hennicke|Alessandro Genovesi|David Cadena II|Lisa Piciollo|Stefania Lorenzi|Maria Pampana|Francesca Menicocci|Maria Antonietta Pagliari|Domenico Renzetti
keywords: tv contest|father daughter relationship|triple f rated|beekeeper|1990s
title: El país de las maravillas
